Giant's Minion Janitt:
So far, Argos isn't exactly falling all over himself to support Embryo. The problem is, he doesn't trust us either. I managed to get him to agree to give me a chance; I have to send someone brave and wise to convince him.
Are you brave enough and wise enough? We're on a time limit here, so I don't know that we have the time to find out. I need you to go talk to him.
